programme.title: Um Pobreto na Casa Branca, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: Quando Washington precisa desesperadamente de um candidato presidncia semanas antes da eleio, no h tempo a perder. Mays Gilliam (Chris Rock), um poltico desconhecido de um pequeno bairro de D.C., escolhido para ser a marionete do governo.

programme.title: O Legionrio, (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Na Marselha dos anos 20, lutador de boxe vence luta que deveria perder de propsito. Para fugir dos gngsters que buscam vingana, resolve se alistar na Legio Estrangeira, onde enfrenta os horrores da batalha no inspito deserto do Marrocos.

programme.title: Os Intocveis, (1987, Crime)
programme.desc: Este confronto clssico entre o bem e o mal estrelado por Kevin Costner , Robert De Niro e Sean Connery , o policial que ensina Ness a vencer a multido: atirar rpido e atirar primeiro.

programme.title: O Justiceiro, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial problemtico disfarado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacvel. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se v lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua famlia.

programme.title: Um Tira da Pesada 3, (1994, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Axel Foley viaja de volta a Beverly Hills para um passeio emocionante de montanha-russa no parque de diverses Wonderworld! Acompanhado pelos velhos amigos Billy Rosewood e Serge, Axel se torna a nova atrao enquanto persegue os bandidos.

programme.title: Os Dois Super-Tiras em Miami, (1985, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Doug Bennet e Steve Forrest permaneceram amigos, mesmo depois que Steve deixou o FBI. Mas, para reuni-los, est Garret, um perigoso ex-presidirio em cujo caso os dois policiais trabalharam juntos.

programme.title: Corao de Drago, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial (Jackie Chan) tem a difcil tarefa de cuidar do seu irmo deficiente mental, Sammo. Quando Sammo, acidentalmente se envolve num roubo, ele sequestrado por bandidos e Jackie, tem que salv-lo.

programme.title: Proposta Indecente, (1993, Romance)
programme.desc: Demi Moore e Woody Harrelson so Diana e David Murphy, um casal com problemas financeiros que esto apostando numa viagem rpida a Las Vegas para conseguir uma boa mo no jogo de cartas.

programme.title: O Milagre, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: Um novo professor enviado para trabalhar numa pequena vila que sequer possui uma escola. L, ele logo faz amizade com um simptico homem deficiente. O professor rene os moradores para construir uma escola ali para ensinar as crianas e seu novo amigo.

programme.title: O Direito de Viver, (2021, Courtroom Drama)
programme.desc: Um grupo de ativistas, feministas e um mdico decidem abrir um processo contra o governo dos EUA para legalizar o aborto e para isso criam um dos maiores embates sociais e jurdicos da histria.

programme.title: Deixados para Trs - A Nova Gerao, (2016, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Quando milhes pessoas subitamente desaparecem ao redor do mundo e o caos comea a tomar conta do pas, a adolescente Gabby forada a amadurecer do dia para a noite, pois ela precisa cuidar no apenas de si, mas tambm de sua irm mais nova, Claire.

programme.title: Grandes Olhos, (2015, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Pintora e defensora das causas feministas, a norte-americana Margaret Keane enfrenta um de seus maiores desafios ao levar ao tribunal o prprio marido. Em um perodo em que o reconhecimento de um trabalho feminino era difcil.

programme.title: Correndo por Um Sonho, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: A histria de Michelle Payne, a primeira jquei feminina a vencer a Melbourne Cup.

programme.title: Um Amor para Recordar, (2020, Romance)
programme.desc: Jamie era a ltima pessoa por quem Landon se apaixonaria. Muito sria e conservadora para seu gosto, filha de um pastor de igreja batista.

programme.title: Lute Por Sua Vida, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Um filme focado em um grupo de pessoas obcecadas por um livro de autoajuda. medida que o livro se torna mais popular, ele afeta uma estranha variedade de personagens. Suas vidas se cruzam, gerando mudanas que duraro para sempre.

programme.title: O Fsico, (2014, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: No sculo XI, um rfo carente viaja para a Prsia para estudar medicina com um renomado curandeiro.

programme.title: Betty e Coretta, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: Estrelando Mary J. Blige e Angela Bassett. Coretta Scott King e a Dra. Betty Shabazz, esposas do Dr. Martin Luther King e de Malcolm X, devem continuar suas vidas como mes solteiras aps o assassinato de seus maridos.

programme.title: Nascem dois sis em Tquio, mais uma operao malfica em movimento pelo Imprio Crisis.

programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.title: Masao presencia um acidente envolvendo soldados do Imprio Crisis e eles deixam cair um controle remoto em formato de teclado que possui habilidades ocultas. Pessoas comeam a ter a aparncia modificada uma atrs da outra e Issamu estuda o caso.
programme.desc: Kamen Rider Black RX

programme.desc: O Fantstico Jaspion

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Histria Do lbum Ilustrado

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pesadelo

programme.title: Assassinato em Sparrow Creek, (2018, Thriller)

programme.title: O Trem-Bala, (2022, Action)

programme.title: O Prisioneiro, (2023, Crime)

programme.title: A Cura de Todo Mal, (1949, Dramedy)

programme.title: A Ilha dos Tubares, (2012, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Um grupo de completos estranhos se v isolado por um louco rico em seu complexo na ilha. Eles so forados a uma luva horripilante, onde devem sobreviver a uma barragem de espcies cada vez mais mortais de tubaro.

programme.title: Apocalipse Zumbi, (2011, Zombies)

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos 2 - O Contgio, (2005, Zombies)
programme.desc: Em 1968, os militares destroem uma instalao aps a liberao de uma bactria. Nos dias atuais, um paciente saindo de uma instituio psiquitrica encontra um velho tubo de vcuo que, ao ser aberto, libera bactrias que transformam as pessoas em zumbis.

programme.title: O feitio da Casa Whaley, (2012, Horror)

programme.title: Orao Diablica, (2020, B-Movie Horror)

programme.title: Pegadas na neve, (2020, Creature Features)

programme.title: Foras do Mal, (2007, Cult Horror)

programme.title: Ataque do Tubaro Mutante, (2011, Creature Features)
programme.desc: Um tubaro gigante afunda um barco-escola em alto-mar. Sobreviventes do bizarro desastre refugiam-se em um atol, mas quando a mar comea a subir, o tubaro mutante de duas cabeas ressurge e ningum est a salvo da fera voraz.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos, (1985, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: Enquanto o mundo tomado por zumbis, um grupo de cientistas e militares abrigados em um bunker subterrneo na Flrida devem determinar como devem lidar com a horda de mortos-vivos e com as diferenas entre os sobreviventes.

programme.title: A Mmia Ressurge, (2021, Creature Features)

programme.title: 21 Jump Street, (2012, Comedy)

programme.title: Mystic Pizza, (1988, Romance)

programme.desc: Filmed over twelve years with the same cast, Richard Linklater's acclaimed smash hit is a groundbreaking celebration of life. Stars Ethan Hawke and Patricia Arquette.

programme.desc: When Kym, returns to the Buchman family home for the wedding of her sister Rachel, she brings a long history of personal crises, family conflict, and tragedy along with her. Rated -R

programme.title: Friday the 13th, (1980, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Camp Crystal Lake has been shuttered for over 20 years due to several vicious and unsolved murders. The camp's new owner and seven young counselors are readying the property for re-opening despite warnings of a "death curse" by local residents.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part II, (1981, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Five years after the bloodbath at Camp Crystal, all that remains is the legend of Jason and his demented mother, who had murdered seven camp counsellors. At a nearby summer camp, the new counsellors are unconcerned about the warnings to stay away.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III, (1982, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Ignoring Camp Crystal Lakes bloody legacy, one by one they fall victim to the maniacal Jason who stalks them at every turn...

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part - IV: The Final Chapter, (1984, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: After his revival in a hospital morgue, the hockey-masked murderer fixes his vengeful attention on the Jarvis family and a group of hitherto carefree teenagers.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part V: A New Beginning, (1985, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: This time he seems to have set his sights on the young patients at a secluded halfway house. And more than a few of his teen targets end up in half, in quarters... you name it, Jason does it.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part VI: Jason Lives, (1986, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: As a child, Tommy Jarvis did what many others died trying to do. He killed Jason Vorhees, the mass murderer who terrorized the residents of Crystal Lake. But now, years later, Tommy is tormented by the fear that maybe Jason isnt really dead.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part VII: The New Blood, (1988, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Ever since homicidal maniac Jason Voorhees got trapped in chains at the bottom of Crystal Lake, the nearby summer camp has operated without a hitch... without a murder. But one of this seasons happy campers has brought along a deadly secret.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring's dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus's hired duelist Panik cheats Mai of all her star chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when Panik's Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?
programme.sub-title: The Light at the End of the Tunnel

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes Panik - "I'll finish you in three turns." Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba descends to the kingdom to face Pegasus. Has Kaiba changed since his battle with Yugi, or is he still the same merciless duelist? A battle between Kaiba's Blue Eyes White Dragon and Joey's Red Eyes Black Dragon holds the answers!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bandit Keith's gang kidnaps Joey to a secret cave with a graveyard playing field. As Yugi and friends search for him, Joey faces Bandit Keith's zombie monsters which become stronger as they return from the grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey's last-ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith's zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers with all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus's castle on the line!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or is his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, the Summoned Skull, and the Red-Eyes Black Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of the Gate Guardian.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, the strongest monster in the game fused from three Blue-Eyes White Dragons! Yugi has lost all his powerful Duel Monsters, but a true duelist never gives up!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi begins spinning a strategy to put the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon to rest, but he must decide whether to claim victory or spare Kaiba his life. Yugi's heart is split in two!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost his star chips to Kaiba and his only opportunity to save Grandpa, Yugi is in a state of shock. Can Tea bring Yugi back to consciousness by defeating Mai for her extra star chips and teach Yugi the heart of the duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends enter the castle to discover Kaiba ready to duel Pegasus with Mokuba's soul hanging in the balance! The power of the Millennium Eye gives Pegasus the ability to read other people's minds.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba is helpless against Pegasus's Toon World deck and mind-reading abilities. As the duel ends, Pegasus imprisons Kaiba's soul into a card, just like Grandpa and Mokuba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi vows to overthrow Pegasus for the sake of his Grandpa. Tristan leads an exploration party to uncover Pegasus's secrets. While Joey sleeps, Bandit Keith steals from him the card that permits his entry in the final battle!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Under Pegasus's glare, Yugi is distracted from his duel with Mai. After making foolish errors and allowing Mai to gain a huge advantage with her Harpie's Pet Dragon, will Yugi gather his focus or succumb to the pressure?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has rebounded from her previous loss to Joey to become a better duelist. Has Yugi learned from his loss to Kaiba, or is the emotional defeat still weighing on his heart? The answer is in the cards!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey searches for the card that permits him to enter the final battle, not realizing Bandit Keith has stolen it. As he struggles to accept the fact that Serenity will be blind forever, he receives help from a new friend!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Bandit Keith's Machine deck forces Joey to take the defensive, Joey mimics Keith's battle strategy to metalize his Red-Eyes Black Dragon! Is victory assured, or does the cheater Bandit Keith literally have one last card up his sleeve?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey challenges Yugi for the right to face Pegasus. In a battle between friends, a fierce match ensues between the two people who know each other's strategies and cards.
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is shocked as Joey uses the Time Wizard card on him. It's the very same card Yugi gave Joey as a sign of friendship!
programme.sub-title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi prepares for the ultimate battle against Pegasus with the souls of Grandpa, Kaiba, and Mokuba on the line.
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus punishes Yugi using the same Toon Deck and mind-reading abilities he used on Kaiba. As Pegasus turns Yugi's monsters against him, Yugi loses the will to battle. Will Pegasus capture Yugi's soul into a card, just like Kaiba?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus's mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus's Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi crumples under the power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi's chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 4

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus summons Relinquished, a fearsome monster that can consume Yugi's Duel Monsters! Yugi counters with Kuriboh?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 5

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi's mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole the Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend the Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it's not the power of the cards, but the heart that's in them that counts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of Kaiba Corporation trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game. Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from Mai? But can YUGI and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past a Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mailose all their life points!

programme.title: Nami and Usopp get an unexpected helping hand in their fight to save the children, Chopper plots a daring escape attempt, and the Master markets his greatest weapon!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Save the Children! The Master's Evil Hands Close In!

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Blood Seal of the Eternal Mermaid"
programme.desc: The Mermaid's Scale is a mysterious aquamarine gemstone that Lupin has been hired to steal it... but it turns out to be a forgery. Now, he needs to find the real jewel before it can be used to destroy the whole world!

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Prison Of The Past"
programme.desc: When the Lupin gang hears the news that Finnegan Corbett, fondly referred to the 'Modern Day Robin Hood', is finally set to be executed, they travel to Kingdom of Dorrente to break him loose

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Green vs. Red"
programme.desc: If Lupin is stealing something in one place, how can he be shoplifting in another place? One Lupin wears red; the other wears green. In the final standoff, whose side will Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko choose?

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "Italian Game"
programme.desc: The stage is set in Italy. Rebecca has been kidnapped! She belongs to one of the most prominent families in the Republic of San Marino and the young woman is the CEO of the Rossellini conglomerate which operates the largest chain of hotels in Italy.

programme.title: Lupin The 3rd "The Secret Of Mamo"
programme.desc: The world's most wanted master thief, Lupin III is dead! Despite a coroner's report, Interpol Inspector Zenigata is skeptical and discovers that Lupin is actually alive and well and stealing! But who had set up Lupin's death and why?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: The Hida Speedway has been completed and Lupin is looking to take top prize at the first race. The race is actually a trap designed by the Scorpion Gang who are intent on killing Lupin and eliminating all criminal competition.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko has stolen something from a man named Pycal, and he wants it back. Pycal is a magician who is able to shoot flames from his hands, walk on air, and deflect bullets with ease. Lupin goes up against Pycal in hopes of saving Fujiko.
programme.sub-title: The Man They Called a Magician

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A boat collision ruins Lupin and Fujiko's quiet boating expedition. They discover a woman named Linda in the other boat just as gunmen on a larger boat attack them.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko successfully pull off a heist; that is until Zenigata manages to shoot Lupin with a tranquilizer dart. Zenigata hauls Lupin off to jail. Despite Fujiko's best efforts, she cannot break Lupin out of prison.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: With the help of some quick gunplay by his partner Jigen, Lupin takes on the world in elaborate heists, classic car chases, and nasty explosions. Fujiko, a buxom redhead with a penchant for betrayal, always gets tangled up in Lupin's capers.
programme.sub-title: The Coming of Goemon the Thirteenth

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: One rainy afternoon, a man seeks Lupin's help on behalf of a young woman. The woman is actually Fujiko, who is after a diamond known as "The Star of Killamanjaro". The diamond was implanted into the chest of a mob boss.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Three scrolls contain the secret of creating a blade like the Zantetsuken. Lupin wants to steal them as a matter of family pride because his grandfather, Arsene Lupin, stole them back in the 19th century.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Napoleon once owned a deck of fortune-telling cards that are now in the hands of a millionaire known as Mr. Gold. Lupin plans to steal them during Mr. Gold's birthday party, and Zenigata plans to stop him. Lupin succeeds in stealing the mysterious cards.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang aim to steal the blueprints for a new computer. In their way is a man skilled with the machinegun and his hit-man partner named Poon, who used to be Fujiko's partner in the past.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone is posing as Lupin and blowing up bridges, causing a lot of damage and injuries. Lupin and Jigen discover that the bomber is trying to force an armored car to travel along a route of his choosing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Mamo Kyosuke claims that Lupin will disappear from the world in four days. He claims that he is a time traveler from 2874 seeking revenge. Apparently, Lupin XIII destroyed the Mamo clan on March 2874.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are both after the legendary Eye of the Nile emerald. It is going to be a wedding gift presented at a wedding being held on a yacht.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Zenigata has been invited to an international police convention in Europe; his chief wants him to go, but Zenigata does not want to since Lupin has declared that he will steal a gold bust within the next three days.
programme.sub-title: Let's Catch Lupin and Go to Europe

programme.title: First Blood, (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A soft-spoken Vietnam vet drifts into a small town looking for no trouble, but finds it in the form of a psychotic local sheriff who finds pleasure in hating him for no reason.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: John Rambo is sent on assignment back to Southeast Asia to uncover evidence of still missing POWs, and ends up with his hands full when he comes up against Vietnamese soldiers still guarding the camps.

programme.title: Rambo III, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Rambo refuses to join his friend and former mentor, Colonel Trautman, on a mission to Afghanistan. The mission fails and Trautman is captured by Russian troops. Now Rambo must infiltrate the Russian fortress to save his only friend.

programme.title: First Blood, (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A soft-spoken Vietnam vet drifts into a small town looking for no trouble, but finds it in the form of a psychotic local sheriff who finds pleasure in hating him for no reason.

programme.title: Cast A Long Shadow, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: Audie Murphy plays Matt, a troubled saddle tramp with a penchant for drinking. When he inherits a massive ranch, it leads him back into the arms of an old flame (Terry Moore), as well as into the fists some old rivals who would rather see him dead.

programme.title: The Kentuckian, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: Eli Wakefield (Burt Lancaster) and his son are Kentucky adventurers longing for life on the Texas frontier. They learn, however, that their greatest challenge lies not in the uncharted wilderness, but in the people they meet along the way.

programme.title: Five Guns To Tombstone, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: A reformed outlaw is living a clean life until his no-good brother who just escaped from prison ropes him into pulling a robbery. Now Billy has his own plan...to prevent it. And all he needs is his six shooters and a little luck.

programme.title: Sabata, (1969, Drama)
programme.desc: Get ready for fast-paced, explosive action as Lee Van Cleef stars as Sabata, the mysterious, steely-eyed gunslinger who, after he discovers the masterminds behind an elaborate bank heist, imposes his bullet-laced brand of justice on a guilty town.

programme.title: Adios, Sabata, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: Under the brutal rule of garrison leader Col. Skimmel, a group of Mexican revolutionaries hire gunslinger Sabata (Yul Brynner) to rob a transport of gold in order to buy weapons. But the Colonel has other plans...taking the gold for himself.

programme.title: Return of Sabata, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: The great Lee Van Cleef ('Death Rides a Horse') returns as the famous freewheeling gunslinger Sabata. In this third and final go-round for the enigmatic sharpshooter, Sabata seeks revenge when a band of desperadoes bilks him out of $5,000.

programme.title: Buffalo Bill And The Indians, (1976, Drama)
programme.desc: Buffalo Bill has fought Indians & Civil War battles, but nothing can prepare him for show business! When he signs Sitting Bull for a role in his Wild West Show, the clash of cultures reverberates far beyond the boundaries of their sprawling theater.

programme.title: The Gunfight at Dodge City, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: Seeking a fresh start, Bat Masterson (Joel McCrea) rolls into Dodge City with a chip on his shoulder and a gun on his hip. But soon, his mysterious past will catch up with him when an old friend calls in a favor...one that might cost him his life!

programme.title: The Unforgiven, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: John Huston directs Audrey Hepburn in this thrilling, romantic western about a woman who becomes the target of lawless racism and brutality when it is discovered that she was born to the Kiowa tribe but secretly adopted by a white frontier family.

programme.title: Catch Me If You Can, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: From three-time Oscar-winning director Steven Spielberg, Catch Me If You Can follows Frank W. Abagnale, Jr. as he successfully passes himself off as a pilot, a lawyer, and a doctor - all before his 21st birthday!

programme.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button, (2008, Romance)
programme.desc: Brad Pitt and Cate Blanchett star in the adaption of F. Scott Fitzgerald's story about an elderly man who ages backward and the problems that arise when he falls in love with a woman.

programme.title: Tigerland, (2000, War Drama)
programme.desc: As a nation stands divided over the war in Vietnam, stark differences of opinion surface among the men of A-Company, triggering unexpected and far-reaching consequences.

programme.title: Flags of Our Fathers, (2006, War Drama)
programme.desc: From Academy Award-winning director Clint Eastwood and Academy Award-winner Steven Spielberg, comes the life stories of the six men who raised the flag at The Battle of Iwo Jima, a turning point in WWII.

programme.title: The Great Raid, (2005, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: As World War II rages, the elite 6th Ranger Battalion is given a mission of heroic proportions: push 30 miles behind enemy lines and liberate over 500 American prisoners of war.

programme.desc: Chibi-Usa is curious to know why Pegasus is reluctant to tell her where he came from. When she confronts Pegasus with the question, he disappears.

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.sub-title: Saturn Awakens: The Ten Sailor Guardians Unite

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon is left devastated after seeing Mamoru get abducted To make matters worse, Nehalennias action is starting to cause a time paradox.

programme.title: Episode
programme.desc: FOX 26 anchor and reporter, Isiah Carey, tackles hot button news issues with a "no holds barred" attitude.

programme.title: A Hora do Acerto
programme.desc: Para a Gangue dos 5, tudo um videogame: matar policiais, armar emboscadas e criar requintes de crueldade. Quem se torna vtima de suas armadilhas o inspetor de polcia Wing e todo o seu time de policiais, que so brutalmente assassinados.

programme.title: O Anjo da Morte
programme.desc: Um policial disfarado se aproxima de seu inimigo. Ela decide deixar um agente de confiana entrar em campo, mas tem dvidas se ela tem o que preciso para completar a misso.

programme.title: Distrito 13 - Ultimato
programme.desc: Damien e Leito esto retornando ao Distrito 13 em uma misso para levar a paz ao setor controlado por cinco lderes de gangues diferentes, antes que os servios secretos da cidade tomem medidas drsticas para resolver o problema.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: A Evoluo
programme.desc: A saga continua mostrando o incio da antiga disputa entre as duas triboso os Vampiros y Lycans, enquanto a bela herona vampira Selene descobre que foi trada pela sua prpria raa e agora precisa buscar vingana.

programme.title: O Grande Dave
programme.desc: Tripulao de aliens em miniatura opera uma nave espacial com forma humana.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Bem-Vindo a Raccoon City
programme.desc: Esta histria de origem, ambientada em 1998, explora os segredos da misteriosa Manso Spencer e da malfadada Raccoon City.

programme.title: Assassino Americano
programme.desc: O gngster americano Erik Vasquez est planejando se tornar o principal chefe do submundo mexicano, apenas para se ver fazendo inimigos tanto dos poderosos cartis quanto de seus prprios aliados.

programme.title: Alvo Duplo
programme.desc: Dois caras dures e pertencentes a lados opostos da lei vo unir foras para dar um ponto final em uma onda de assassinatos brutais, mas a tarefa no ser nada fcil e muito sangue vai rolar.

programme.title: Ruas Em Guerra
programme.desc: Quando o implacvel Lord Rincon e sua gangue MS-13 recrutam Miguel, de 10 anos, para trabalhar como um de seus entregadores de drogas, Lucas, irmo mais velho de Miguel e que tambm trabalha para o bandido, est desesperado para manter o garoto seguro.

programme.title: 90 Minutos
programme.desc: Um traficante de drogas tenta fazer um ltimo trabalho para seguir em frente com sua vida, mas no ser to fcil se livrar do mundo do crime e a noite promete ser a pior de sua vida.

programme.title: Ouro Branco
programme.desc: Rap, carres, bluses de couro espalhafatosos e muita grana no bolso. Ace entra para o mundo do crime sem desconfiar que a partir da sua vida j no vale mais nada.

programme.title: Linha de Ao
programme.desc: O prefeito contrata um ex-policial para investigar quem o amante de sua esposa. Apesar de suas antigas discordncias, ele aceita a tarefa, mas logo descobre as reais intenes por trs da investigao encomendada.

programme.title: Jogo Assassino
programme.desc: A polcia prende um psicopata que est ligado a vrios sequestros e assassinatos de mulheres, mas sua captura ser apenas o incio de uma contagem regressiva em busca de suas vtimas.

programme.title: O Grito 3
programme.desc: Dr. Sullivan descobre que os fantasmas de Kayako e Toshio tm como alvo uma nova famlia. Se ela falhar em convencer uma misteriosa mulher japonesa a ajudar a banir os espritos vingativos, todos os envolvidos enfrentaro um destino pior do que a morte.

programme.title: Cuidado com Quem Chama
programme.desc: Seis amigos atraem a ateno de uma presena demonaca durante uma sesso online e comeam a notar ocorrncias estranhas nas suas casas.

programme.title: Psicopata Americano II
programme.desc: A histria se passa quase 15 anos aps os acontecimentos de Psicopata Americano, acompanhando a nica sobrevivente de Patrick Bateman. Ela se torna assistente de um professor e comea a desenvolver obsesses assassinas, destruindo quem cruzar seu caminho.

programme.title: Possuda
programme.desc: Depois de descobrir que sua irm mais velha foi mordida por um lobisomem, a adolescente Brigitte embarca em uma misso desesperada para encontrar uma maneira de reverter o feitio e salv-la antes que seja tarde demais.

programme.title: Dia dos Namorados Macabro
programme.desc: H 20 anos, um trgico acidente no Dia dos Namorados matou cinco mineiros quando supervisores abandonaram seus postos para ir a um baile. No aniversrio da tragdia, o nico sobrevivente volta cidade em busca de uma vingana sangrenta.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 3
programme.desc: Ao lado de sua nova aprendiz Amanda,o manipulador por trs dos jogos cruis e complexos, que aterrorizaram uma comunidade e chocaram a polcia, mais uma vez escapa de ser capturado e desaparece.

programme.title: Spooks: O Mestre Espio
programme.desc: Quando um terrorista escapa da custdia durante uma transferncia de rotina, Will Crombie deve colaborar com Harry Pearce, o chefe desonrado do Servio de Inteligncia Britnico MI5, para rastre-lo antes de um iminente ataque terrorista em Londres.

programme.title: Morte por Encomenda

programme.title: Refns

programme.title: Juzo Final

programme.title: Resident Evil: Bem-Vindo a Raccoon City

programme.title: Megaterremoto

programme.title: Apocalipse Zumbi

programme.title: O Justiceiro

programme.title: Antes S Do Que Mal Acompanhado
programme.desc: Neal s que voltar para Chicago e passar o Dia de Ao de Graas com sua famlia. Mas ele s se d mal. Tudo culpa de Del Griffith um vendedor desbocado que leva Neal a uma busca sem sentido.

programme.desc: Quando Washington precisa desesperadamente de um candidato presidncia semanas antes da eleio, no h tempo a perder. Mays Gilliam (Chris Rock), um poltico desconhecido de um pequeno bairro de D.C., escolhido para ser a marionete do governo.
